contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Quinto Vercellese | official_name = Comune di Quinto Vercellese | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Quinto_Vercellese-Stemma.png | shield_size = 90px | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 23 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 8 |longm = 22 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(438)_region:IT | coordinates_display = | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Piedmont]] | province = [[Province of Vercelli| Vercelli]] (VC) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = Alessandra Ticozzi | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 11.1 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 438 | population_as_of = Dec. 2004 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Quintini or Quintesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 13030 | area_code = 0161 | website = | footnotes = }} '''Quinto Vercellese''' is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Vercelli]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Piedmont]], located about 60 km northeast of [[Turin]] and about 8 km northwest of [[Vercelli]]. As of 31 December 2004, it had a population of 438 and an area of 11.1 kmÂ².<ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].</ref> Quinto Vercellese borders the following municipalities: [[Caresanablot]], [[Collobiano]], [[Olcenengo]], and [[Oldenico]]. ==References== {{reflist}} <br> {{Vercelli-geo-stub}} <br clear=all> {{Province of Vercelli}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Piedmont]]
